app_name: Hide Photos & Videos - Calculator Photo Vault
app_detail:
ğŸŒ¤ï¸ Hide Photos & Videos - Calculator photo vault is a app easily hide and encrypt your photos, videos. You can import your private images and videos in this secure gallery vault, and nobody knows the existence of it.
ğŸŒ¤ï¸ "Hide Photos & Videos - Calculator photo vault" app looks like a beautiful calculator, and works very well. But have a secret photo vault and video vault behind it, uninstall the app will not delete the password, or remove the photos. 

ğŸMain features of Hide Photos & Videos - Calculator photo vaultğŸ
âœ¶ Hide photos, hide video under the calculator
âœ¶ No one knows the existence of Gallery Vault except you.
âœ¶ Hide photos, hide videos and hide any other types of files
âœ¶ Hide photos, hide videos easily from a gallery, album or photos
âœ¶ The hidden files (photo vault, video vault) are all encrypted
âœ¶ No storage limitation to hide photos and hide videos
âœ¶ Backup & Restore data quickly from Google Drive
âœ¶ Use the sd-card to store your private photo and video vault.
âœ¶ Create an encrypted backup in your private Google Driveâ„¢ Cloud
âœ¶ Turn off the app to close Gallery Vault (Photo vault, video vault, backup) quickly
âœ¶ Share gallery vault directly on Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Etc.
âœ¶ Private photo vault, video vault is hidden from your recently used apps list.
âœ¶ Creates a video vault that offers protection for your private videos

CALCULATOR of gallery vault have Functional basic calculator with calculator icon with simple and beautiful UI design. That helps you hide photos, hide videos easily.

ğŸ€Hide photo and Hide videos is easy with Calculator photo vault appğŸ€
1) Setup account and create new pin
2) Go into the first photo album already created for you
3) Hit the plus button to hide photo and hide video. These photos will locked into Hide Photos & Hide Videos - Calculator photo vault.
4)Backup and Restore in your private Google Driveâ„¢ Cloud
5) Now you have a private gallery vault that only you can view.

What can I do if I forgot my passcodeâ‰ï¸
ğŸ“Œ Launch "Hide Photos & Videos - Calculator photo vault" app.
ğŸ“Œ Try to unlock in " Calculator photo vault" and fail for 2 times, then a Forgot button will show.
ğŸ“Œ Tap "Forgot" button and tap "Resend Auth Email" button in the dialog.

â¡ï¸With " Hide Photos & Videos - Calculator photo vault" app, your privacy is the best protected.
â¡ï¸Backup: Backup your apps to SD card or RAM or cloud drive. Up your device storage! Faster and Smaller.

Thank you for your trust and use the application Hide Photos & Hide Videos - Calculator photo vault
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us by email to the developer. Do not forget to rate this 5â­â­â­â­â­ for Hide Photos & Hide Videos - Calculator photo vault. If it's useful!
